description: Hong Kong s Forgotten Past, Reimagined in Cantonese Cocktails Wrap up Consensus Day 1 with something a little more cinematic Step into Hong Kong s forgotten past at a Cantonese cocktail salon where old-world traditions meet modern craft Rooted in the spirit of a bygone Hong Kong and reimagined through mid-century modern design, Kinsman pays homage to the city s lost distilling heritage. Expect meticulously crafted Cantonese cocktails made with locally sourced ingredients , each one telling a story from the city s past refracted through a contemporary lens. Why attend Connect with Web3 founders and builders Cantonese cocktails curated canap s Old Hong Kong nostalgia with a Wong Kar-wai mood Drinks, conversations, and a little time travel. See you there Vibe Just a 9-min Uber ride from the venue Host Halborn is the industry-leading blockchain solutions firm for enterprise-grade digital assets and trusted by top financial institutions. World-class, end-to-end security, from smart contract auditing and pen testing to advisory services and beyond. Dfns is a leading Wallets-as-a-Service platform simplifying digital asset management for fintechs and enterprises globally. It offers secure wallet APIs, including Transaction Management, Wallet Entitlement, and Key Deployment Services, ensuring compliance and security.
